document_data.name: Sorn Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Sorn Street''' was a road of hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]] in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This road stretched from east to west, spanning between [[Salabar Street]] in the west and [[Wall Way]] in the east. Between these two roads, it acted as the southern terminus of [[Urcandle Alley]] and the opening to [[Brindul Alley]].

Notable Locations.[[Uza Solizeph]]'s Bookstore: A three-story bookstore that was owned and operated by Uza Solizeph.
